posts.post_title: FS T206 A couple of Lajoie Portraits
posts.post_content:
Since these seem to be in demand, I thought I'd offer a couple for sale.  If interested please contact me via either pm or email at [url]kardboys@yahoo.com[/url].  Please assume pp ff, messages will be responded to in order and I'll take it trumps any ongoing negotiations.  Item will be sent USPS priority.

Lajoie portrait - Piedmont 150 SGC 50 - $xxxx.xx

Lajoie portrait - Piedmont 150 SGC 40 - xxx.xx

Please find images here:

 [url]https://imgur.com/gallery/qvAW6cR[/url]

Thank you.

Bob Intrieri
